name: Voidcrab
description:
Voidcrab is a challenging lo-fi pixel-art metroid-vania platformer in which you will get lost. Calming and frustrating at the same time.

You play as a mechanical crab that wants to reach solid ground. Along the way you can collect crystals,  but try not to fall into the dreadful void.

The controls are:

Arrows to move.
Space bar to jump.
Esc for menu and stats.
